ApplicationDescription: An emergency voicemail style application with notifications via PagerDuty

ConfigurationValues.Name: Key
ConfigurationValues.Description: Your AWS key (make one specific to this task!)

ConfigurationValues.Name: Secret
ConfigurationValues.Description: The secret that goes with the Key you're using

ConfigurationValues.Name: Bucket
ConfigurationValues.Description: The AWS bucker you want to store the recording in

ConfigurationValues.Name: Folder
ConfigurationValues.Description: The folder (virtual) that you want to store your recording in

ConfigurationValues.Name: AWSRegion
ConfigurationValues.Description: The region your S3 bucket exists in, E.g. eu-west

ConfigurationValues.Name: PagerDutyServiceToken
ConfigurationValues.Description: The token for the pager duty service this alert belongs to
